pageProduct.name: Skin Control Pimple Patches PM Overnight Wear 24 Patches
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Sleep easy knowing Pimple Patch has got you covered! This optimal weight for overnight wear creates a secure hold when applied, ensuring a strong application to the affected area throughout the night.

Warnings

For external use only. Stop use and consult your healthcare practitioner if skin irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Cleanses Pimples Helps absorb whiteheads Protects from dirt Clear - blends in with skin

Ingredients

Sodium Carboxy Methyl Cellulose, Elastomer, Dioctyl Adipate (1%), 100% Hydrogenated Petroleum Resin, Polyurethane Film, Teatree Oil (1%)

Directions

Clean the area, apply the patch and wait. The patch then goes to work to help control and cover your spot, while blending into the skin. 1. Cleanse and dry skin before applying patch 2. Patch acts as protective layer 3. Patch color will change to white 4. Gently peel to remove
